item.title: Gujarat: Incessant rainfall ha
item.description: Gujarat: Incessant rainfall hampers daily life; commuters wade through waist-deep water in Vadodara #gujarat #rainfall #floods

item.title: Security tightened in Kolkata
item.description: Security tightened in Kolkata as BJP calls for ‘Bengal Bandh’ after chaotic Nabanna Abhiyan #nabannaabhiyan #kolkata #bengalbandh

item.title: Tibetan spiritual leader Dalai
item.description: Tibetan spiritual leader Dalai Lama returns to his exile home, receives warm welcome in Dharamshala #DalaiLama #TibetianLeader #Dharamshala #WarmWelcome #KangraAirport
